about_the_game:
The Official Guide of Construction Simulator will show you the countless possibilities the game has to offer and help you make the right decision for every situation:

  • Which are the most suitable machines for a certain task?
  • What are the best ways to play the Campaign and Multiplayer Modes?
  • Where do I find which collectibles across all maps?
  • How can I level my character the best way?
  • What's the best way to keeping good finances in the game?

It includes more than 200 pages with all required tips, tricks and information to take the best out of the game!


This guide covers:

  • USA & Europe Map Overview with Icons and Landmarks
  • Jobs, Contracts and Offers
  • Campaign in the USA and Europe
  • Upgrading your Company
  • Milestones and Profiles
  • Full information on the game vehicles
  • Collectibles and Achievements
  • Game Settings and Configurations

and much more!


Access

The Official Guide can be found in the Steam installation folder as "Official Guide" (Steam\SteamApps\common\Construction Simulator), after the download of the Official Guide DLC-Package is complete.
